Term.Name: Same language dialogue
Term.Definition: Subtitles for the dialog in the default audio language.

Term.Name: Other language dialogue
Term.Definition: Translated subtitles for dialogs other than the default language.

Term.Name: All dialogue
Term.Definition: Subtitles for all dialogs regardless of language.

Term.Name: Hard of hearing
Term.Definition: Subtitles produced for the deaf and hard of hearing with no distinction between default language and other languages

Term.Name: Other language dialogue with hard of hearing
Term.Definition: Subtitles produced for the deaf and hard of hearing only for a language that is not the default audio language.

Term.Name: All dialogue with hard of hearing
Term.Definition: Subtitles produced for the deaf and hard of hearing for all dialogues (whether they are in the default audio language or other languages).

Term.Name: Audio description
Term.Definition: Subtitles that includes the description of the visual scene and that intended to be used by the receiver to render audio description (e.g. with text-to-speech technology.

Term.Name: Content related commentary
Term.Definition: Subitles that include content-related commentary (e.g. directors commentary).
